text: This list of Vogue Polska cover models is a catalog of cover models who have appeared on the cover of Vogue Poland, the Polish edition of Vogue magazine, starting with the magazine's first issue in March 2018. ==2018== {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size:95%; width:100%;" |- !
